item.title: GlassLibrary Seeding Returns!
item.description: After the interuption, the GlassLibrary is back to seeding. However, it is not fully stable and may go down again. An alert will be sent out of seeding goes down again, or once regular seeding resumes.

item.title: GlassLibrary Seeding Down
item.description: Due to an error in hardware and being away from my workstation, the GlassLibrary will be unable to seed torretns for roughly 2 weeks. A new alert will be sent out when seeding resumes.

item.title: Games Archive Update
item.description: Not a major update, just giving everything a test. The only new file is a backup of "Sexy Hiking"

item.title: GlassLibrary RSS Launches
item.description: This update is nothing important, just the start of the GlassLibrary RSS feed. As torrent files get updated, this feel will alert users.
